1078410.name: Mongrel Prologue
1078410.description:
Step into the twisted world of Mongrel in this playable prologue, featuring the chaotic first chapter of your descent into Yonder.

Meet Bonk, your razor-tongued guide through the wastelands of the Ash Hole and the festering depths of The Fangmire. Battle through corrupted creatures, discover ancient eggs packed with bizarre upgrades, and face off against your first boss.

This prologue includes:

  • The first chapter of the story

  • Your first friend: Bonk

  • One dungeon and one boss fight

  • A taste of twisted upgrades

The full madness awaits, this is just the start!
1078410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
